programme.title: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor Ep19
programme.desc: Lepoq Keq Tanjung Selor adalah sebuah dokumentari yang meneroka keindahan alam, landskap menawan, dan tradisi unik di Tanjung Selor, Kalimantan Utara.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep260
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Sesama Copet Dilarang Saling Mencuri Hati
programme.desc: Seorang gadis cantik bernama Dinda, tanpa pengetahuan keluarganya, bekerja sebagai penyeluk saku. Hal yang sama juga dilakukan oleh Emir, yang tanpa diketahui oleh keluarganya, terpaksa menjalani kehidupan itu kerana kesukaran mendapatkan pekerjaan. Suatu hari, Emir dan Dinda berebut dompet yang dicuri oleh mereka. Hampir saja Dinda terjatuh, namun Emir pantas menolong gadis itu. Lalu, mata mereka saling bertatapan.

programme.title: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa Ep30
programme.desc: Ungkap Hikmah Di Balik Dosa adalah sebuah rancangan yang menilai kejadian atau peristiwa dari perspektif Islam, mengungkap hikmah di sebalik dosa.

programme.title: Suster El Ep31
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep95
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.desc: The show returns with a star-studded lineup including Joker Xue and Yang Di. This brain-teasing variety talk show explores trending memes and audience interests, featuring exciting challenges with prominent celebrities. Get ready for a fun showdown thats sure to entertain everyone!

programme.title: Star Chaser Season 3 Ep12
programme.desc: Nicky Wu and new members like Raymond Lam, Ryan Ding, Lin Yun and Zhao Xiaotang are invited to serve as the members of Star Chaser, letting go the trivialities and troubles of daily life and recalling the sincere and touching relationship under the starry sky. Lets share the sense of healing in the trip!

programme.title: My Boyfriend Ep4
programme.desc: CEO Yi Ning enters a contractual marriage with Shen Qianze, unaware of his revenge motive against her family. Initially filled with hatred, Shen falls for Yi Ning while fighting to protect her company. After his uncle Su Jingxuan frames Yi Ning and seizes her business, Shen helps expose Sus crimes, restoring justice and renewing their relationship built on trust.

programme.title: Love Behind the Mask Ep13
programme.desc: The story follows Wen Yanshu and Mu Han, who meet and fall in love while hiding their actual identities. They protect their homes and strive for a better world together, finding comfort in each others past wounds and bravely facing their responsibilities and missions.

programme.title: Ready To Dance Season 2 Ep8
programme.desc: Season 2 included a street dance youth group from Guangdong, Hong Kong, and Macau, led by Santa Uno, Ao Ziyi, Even Wong, and Robby Huang. Under their supervision, the youths faced challenges in three stages: the initial stage, collaboration stage, and final performance stage. They combined dynamic music and passionate dance to showcase the fusion of traditional Chinese culture with street dance culture.

programme.title: Love Never Comes Late Season 3 Ep13
programme.desc: A dating program designed for singles or divorced people who have passed the age of marriage. 4 male guests and 3 female guests would join the one-to-one communication in sequence per episode. programme.title: The Melody of You Season 2 (Live) Ep6
programme.desc: Season 2 features 7diverse musicians: Chang Chen-yue, Zhang Bicheng, Philip Lau, Lil Ghost, Nana Ou-Yang, Wang Heye, and Chen Zhuoxuan. programme.title: Wei Jie Xiang Chou Ep7
programme.desc: This story explores the emotional connection between people and their hometown food. Through interviews with locals and those abroad, it highlights how food symbolizes their roots and showcases the rich history and authentic flavors of Jiangsu cuisine.

programme.title: Singing With Legends Season 6 (Repackaged) Ep6
programme.desc: The program has been refreshed and upgraded, departing from its initial structure. The topic of the show is "Listening to the Voice of the World, Singing With Legends." The musical extravaganza that will be created is full of infinite vitality and features over 30 singers, including Liu Yuning, Mao Buyi, Ma Jiaqi, Leo Ku, Hacken Lee, Tengger, and Gong Linna. The goal is to get back to the core of music and work together to produce fusion hits that will increase opportunities for collaboration and communication amongst the artists.

programme.title: Her Disguise Ep10
programme.desc: Lin Mange, a righteous and smart medical student, sneaks into the Lu family to avenge her friend Lanlan's bizarre and tragic death and becomes the eldest son's fiance. However, she is discovered by the fox-like second son Lu Haoran, and a series of abuses and counter-killings begin. As she gets along with Lu Haoran, she is attracted by his sincerity and sense of justice beneath his disguise. The two go from suspicion to trust to love and finally find justice and the truth.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5084
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Cape No. 7
programme.desc: A Taiwanese singer tries to deliver seven old love letters attentioned to a Tomoko. As he falls in love with a young Japanese model also named Tomoko, he unravels their serendipitous connection.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963 and ruthlessly built an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: Rob N Roll
programme.desc: A ruthless bandit, Tian, has plotted an intense and quick armed robbery. When he encounters Hui and Shui who also plan for a robbery, they decide to team up for the heist. However, their ad-hoc and dramatic robbery has started a war with the police hot on pursuit, putting their lives on the line!

programme.title: A Legend
programme.desc: Archaeologist Professor Fang uncovers artifacts from a glacier expedition that resembles a jade pendant in his dream. To unveil the truth, Professor Fang leads his team to a journey into the glacier, embarking on a fantastical adventure together.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2013
programme.desc: Sung Chi Hung and Ha Shek Lam worked at a Chinese restaurant when they were young and both fell in love with the owners daughter, Yeung. Sung and Yeung eventually got married and took over the restaurant. Many years later, Sung meets Ha who is now a real estate tycoon and plans to buy out the restaurant. Can Sung save the restaurant?

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: Hackers have caused a large-scale cyber attack, but luckily cyber security engineer Chun, manages to fend it off with his protective firewall system. To Chun's surprise, his boss is the mastermind of the attack, and when Chun gets trapped in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Table for Six 2
programme.desc: The sequel to "Table for Six", Bernard and Lung plan to get married while their eldest brother is away. Yet, the weddings spiral into a chaotic battleground with escalating family drama, creating a messy affair for everyone involved.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: Corruption was rampant in the Hong Kong Police Force in 1960s and 70s. Chief Inspector Lak launders drug money with three other police officers, and a young officer from the newly established Independent Commission Against Corruption division is determined to bring them down.

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-laws affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brothers death?

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his familys expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his familys reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husbands love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: Bo lost her eye sight in a serious car accident a year ago. One day, she is left alone at home when her husband is away on a work trip. An intruder enters Bo's house and takes her hostage. As Bo tries to survive his mental and psychological torture, she discovers her husband's secret which is related to the accident leading to her blindness

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Mobster Sing aspires to join the Axe Gang. As he stumbles into a slum ruled by eccentric landlords that are kung fu masters in disguise, his actions cause the gang and the landlords to engage in an explosive kung fu battle

programme.title: YOLO
programme.desc: Feeling lost and aimless, Le Ying chooses to withdraw from society after a short working experience. After a series of unexpected events one day, she decides to embrace life anew. She sees a chance for a fresh start when she meets a boxing coach, yet the challenges ahead far exceed her expectations, marking a vibrant start to her journey.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Little Dragon Maiden
programme.desc: With Hong Kong cinema's new wave, high flying, martial arts action of the 1980's, came a new wave of actors; teeny-bopper, canto-pop singer/stars with little or no martial arts background. However, when a film like LITTLE DRAGON MAIDEN intelligently mixes the old with the new, the results are pure golden magic. This costume-action, drama, love story features relative newcomer Leslie Cheung, who falls in love with the Dragon Maiden while learning the art of swordplay. The recipe is complete when veteran kung-fu stars Chen Kuan-tai and Lo Lieh add just enough weapon-wielding spice to make this film really cook. Cheung garnered international recognition in John Woo's A BETTER TOMORROW and Ronny Yu's THE BRIDE WITH WHITE HAIR.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Sword And The Lute
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his bride use the deadly weapon - Phoenix Lute to fight against evil, but the lute accidentally falls into the hands of bandits hoping to use it to take control of the province. Gui Wu must now fight to recover the lute and beat the bandits.

programme.title: Diary of a Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: Come Drink with Me
programme.desc: The brother of the mystery swordswoman "Golden Swallow is kidnapped. She joins forces with a beggar Drunken Cat who is skilled in martial arts to free her brother from a Buddhist monastery run by a corrupt abbot. The film was selected as Hong Kongs entry for the Best Foreign Language Film at the 39th Academy Awards.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Eight Diagram Pole Fighter
programme.desc: The Yang Generals were ambushed by the enemies and only two of the sons survived. The fifth son of Yangs escapes to Shaolin temple and learns the pole-fighting techniques from the monks, eventually creating his own Eight Diagram Pole Fight and teaming up with the Shaolin monks to avenge his family.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lous brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: The Treasure Hunters
programme.desc: Fans of the international star Alexander Fu Sheng were aghast. Their idol had broken both his legs and was recuperating. Everyone wondered: would he be able to return to the action comedies for which he was so famous? This movie was the answer, and it left no doubt that he had made a full recovery. Liu Chia-yung, brother of preeminent martial arts moviemaker Liu Chia-liang, was famous in his own right for kung-fu comedies, and he out-did himself with this one. Imagine Bob Hope and Bing Crosby with the skills of Jet Li and Jackie Chan, and youve got an idea of the fun and fury inherent in this delightful tale of two con men vying for a horde of hidden gold. Add to the mix a Shaolin monk (played by "Master Killer" Gordon Liu Chia-hui), a powerfully brutal villain, and his equally dangerous mute sister (future director Yang Tsing-tsing), and youve got one of the most internationally loved kung-fu capers ever made.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women only give birth to baby girls and do so by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Muis embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huangs father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Trilogy Of Swordsmanship
programme.desc: A kung fu anthology film consisting of three stories: a man embarrasses himself while trying to prove his worth to the father of the woman he loves; a courtesan in love with a general will need to deliver a notorious bandit in exchange for him not being executed; and a group of bandits forms a plan to rescue a new friend from being executed.

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: A Friend from Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Golden Knight
programme.desc: The heroine Yu Fei Xia is accused of stealing the book of martial arts secrets. To prove her innocence, she disguises herself as a man and finds her way into the Shaolin Temple to find out the truth

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.title: Get Educated: Paathshaala
programme.desc: Rahul joins a school as a teacher and instantly strikes a rapport with the children. But he soon realises that the management is more concerned about its monetary benefits rather than the children.

programme.title: Nastik
programme.desc: A young Shankar is devasted when Tiger kills his entire family. He turns into an atheist, blaming God for his misfortune and sets off to seek revenge on Tiger.

programme.title: Blind

programme.desc: Twins Kishan and Kanhaiya swap their identities so that they can win over Radha. However, Bijli tries to foil their plans as she desperately loves Kishan.

programme.title: Blue

programme.title: Children Of A Lesser God

programme.desc: A single mother raises a child prodigy on her own, struggling to give him every opportunity he needs to express his gift.

programme.title: Surf's Up

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: A retired marshal and his new bride learn that a killer whom the marshal sent to jail is coming back to town on the noon train, seeking revenge. Deserted by his friends and former deputies, he faces the killer and his gang alone.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series Of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: In a land where beauty is preserved by the innocence of those who live there, two young people become entangled in the ongoing battle between good and evil.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A typical married couple a little bored with their relationship come to discover that they are enemy assassins hired to kill each other.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A tired American ex-boxer returns to his native hamlet in Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by strict local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this lively film has beautiful scenery, brilliant repartee, and local charm.

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: In December 1935, when his transcontinental luxury train is stranded by deep snow, detective Hercule Poirot is called on to solve a murder that occurred in his car the night before, with a multitude of suspects.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: When a fugitive couple's glamorous and sometimes deadly adventure erupts into a maze of double-crosses, close escapes, false identities, and head-spinning romantic snafus, they come to realize that all they can count on is each other.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder

programme.title: LFRC: MET Gala 2025
programme.desc: Affectionately referred to as fashions biggest night out, the Met Gala 2025 is a fundraising benefit for the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City that is held every year on the first Monday in May. The 2025 Met Gala will take place on Monday, May 5 and will celebrate the Costume Institutes new exhibition, Superfine: Tailoring Black Style.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It
programme.desc: Kate Reddy (Sarah Jessica Parker) manages the ultimate balancing act between work and her adoring family in this comedy based on the bestseller by Allison Pearson.

programme.title: The Karate Kid: Part II
programme.desc: After learning about his dying father, Mr Miyagi sets off to see him with Daniel. Upon reaching there, he decides to confront an old rival; meanwhile, Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas (Jack Kane), a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge.

programme.title: The Legend Of Zorro
programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: City Of Ember
programme.desc: Ember was built as a refuge for humanity 200 years ago. Now, the great generator that powers the city is failing, and Ember is falling into darkness as the dazzling lights begin to flicker and fade.

programme.title: Star Trek: First Contact
programme.desc: Captain Jean Luc-Picard and the crew of the newly commissioned Enterprise E battle the insidious Borg to restore the rightful future of Earth.

programme.title: Twilight
programme.desc: A troubled teenage girl moves in with her dad in a small isolated town. She falls for a mysterious loner with a shocking secret - could he be anything to do with the local murders that have started taking place?

programme.desc: Miami detectives Marcus Burnett and Mike Lowrey are back in a war on the drug Ecstasy on the streets in Miami.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Tears Of The Sun
programme.desc: In Tears of the Sun, a Navy SEAL team is sent to rescue a doctor in war-torn Nigeria. The mission shifts from extraction to saving refugees as they face brutal rebels while navigating the dangerous jungle.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Joe (Nicolas Cage) is a career assassin who is in Bangkok to handle a contract, when he finds himself unexpectedly training a young protg and falling for a woman who has no knowledge of his true vocation.

programme.title: Shanghai

programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.desc: Federation outpost Fort Casey is attacked by bugs. The Alesia crew must evacuate survivors and intel. Minister Jenkins' secret mission goes awry, prompting a perilous rescue.

programme.title: The Mating Game S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungles: In The Thick Of It - Jungles are home to 80% of all species but they cover just 2% of the planet. When animals in these crowded forests want to mate, the challenge is how to stand out from the crowd.

programme.title: Big Adventures: Into the Amazon with Robson Green S1 Ep2
programme.desc: This time starting in Manaus, capital of the state of Amazonas, Robson's adventure kicks off with a truly astonishing natural phenomenon: the Meeting of Waters.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep2
programme.desc: California - A couple from Salt Lake City, Utah, decide to move to the mountainous coast of Shelter Cove, California.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Kenya - Robson heads to the east coast of Kenya, where the Indian Ocean offers some of the best game fishing in the world.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Search for the Secret Bear - The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Becoming a Bear - Bone up on outdoor skills as Winston and the X girls move into their new fresh-air enclosure, and witness Yasmine and Yaras kindergarten power struggle. Then look over restless yearling Victor, whose sudden limp pushes back his release date.

programme.title: Cub Camp S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Victor Goes Wild - Experience the joys of rain and climbing with Yasmine and Yara, and watch Winston take a dip in his new pool. Go hunting for dropped radio collars with Roger and Steve, then see what happens when the two groups of summer cubs come face-to-face.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Collar Complications - Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep3
programme.desc: The Misfit Comes of Age - If the tiny Nsefu pride is to survive, the teen Misfit and his older brother must quickly perfect their hunting skills. Trek into enemy territory as the lions face dominant rivals and a powerful hyena clan in the search for prey.

programme.title: Africa's Hunters S3 Ep4
programme.desc: The Leopard Who Changed Her Spots - Meet pampered young leopardess Chipadzua, who has never had to hunt for food, thanks to her patient mother. Alone for the first time in her life, will she develop the skills it takes to survive?

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tidal Forest of Africa - We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stork Pack in Trouble - Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Africa - Observe the eternal search for water that defines the lives of Africas wild animals. Witness the biggest marine feeding frenzy on Earth, see how cobras stock up on solar power, and join wildebeest herds and elephant clans on their epic migrations.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Life Among Trees - How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And whats it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Dry Season - The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to surviveand if they dont, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari - Take a look at one of Africas most abundant and diverse wildlife areas, the Okavango Delta. Investigate the way the delta functions and learn about the variety of interesting species that live in the area.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Elephant Dilemma - Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Wild Sky S1 Ep4
programme.desc: South America - Learn how South Americas rich diversity of weather fuels an even richer diversity of life. Examine the Amazon rainforests oxygen-breathing trees, follow the arc of a vast cloud river, and meet flamingos that thrive in the suns scorching UV rays.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Big Cats, Big Trouble - Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon S1 Ep3

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Wild West - Complete the trips final lap in the untamed lands where Australias interior desert meets the hot, hostile Indian Ocean. Confront the challenges of survival in this region as Lizzie dives with tiger sharks, manta rays, and nomadic turtles.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Earth - Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Urban Penguins - An unusual colony of African penguins have learned to live with their human neighbours on the southwestern tip of Africa, but their tenacity is tested by golf courses, highways, pets, and a sea of curious humans who view them as a tourist attraction.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 7 - Rick boards the ferry in Penzance to take him to the Isles of Scilly, a group of islands which were once part of Cornwall. And in the world-famous gardens of Tresco, Rick meets a beekeeper attempting to breed a native Scillonian honeybee to deal with the harsh Atlantic climate. This inspires Rick to cook a honey pudding with Cornish ice cream and a butterscotch sauce.

programme.title: Jamie's 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode Jamie's got recipes that make a hero of the freezer and store cupboard: using frozen fish to save on time, money and planning; making a super-speedy snack that gives frozen veggies their place in the sun; and two hearty dishes that elevate store-cupboard staples to the next level. And he's called on his mentor and all-round Italian legend, Gennaro Contaldo, to rustle up some delicious homemade gnocchi using just 5 easy ingredients.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Remote Hideaways - In Jordan we find out what it's like to stay deep in the desert sleeping underneath the stars at the Bubble Luxotel Wadi Rum resort - a remote and unusual series of transparent "bubble" tents which look more like a cluster of space craft on Mars. In Norfolk, England, we visit an unusual two hundred year old building, known as Cley Windmill.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep72

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep74
programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 1 - The girls get summer jobs to help Lucky repair the sprawling house she inherited from her grandfather near the Rosemead Valley Racetrack.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Riding Academy Ep75
programme.desc: Race To The Finish Part 2 - Determined to save her family home, Lucky signs up to race as a wild card in Rosemead's elite Junior Cup. But winning it all won't be easy.

programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep10
programme.desc: Talent Show / Sad Sad Plant - Kelp writes a song about him and Scallop to perform at the unicorn show. But when it comes time, Scallop wants to keep the song just for them, leaving Kelp to come up with anew act- and fast! / The kids all visit the magical musical plant greenhouse on Unicorn Land. They each pick a plant to take care of, and for Kelp its a sad, almost dead plant that he falls in love with.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! Ep36
programme.desc: Trick or Thief / Meow-Lo-Ween - Tag and Scooch attend a Howl-O-Ween costume party at the Big Bowl Diner, excited to get a taste of Wagnes famous Pupclairs. But when the lights go out and the treats go missing, it's up to Tag to solve the case. / Tag and Scooch are determined to throw a Howl-O-Ween party for their cat friends in Meowbuquerque, but they must get the dogs of Pawston to change their ways so they can make the celebration more cat-friendly.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep14
programme.desc: Robo-Dog Day Afternoon / Spoiler Alert - New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep10
programme.desc: Slobber Power - Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep12
programme.desc: The Flight Stuff - With Snotlouts fate unclear, Gustav tries to fill in for him at the Dragon Academy.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep13
programme.desc: Free Scauldy - Hiccup, Toothless, and the dragon riders discover an injured Scauldron on the shores of Changewing Island. When the Scauldron takes a shine to Ruffnut, the kids see a chance to heal the dragon and return him safely to the ocean, before he falls victim to the elements, as well as the territorial Changewings.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep14
programme.desc: Frozen - During an ice storm, Speed Stingers infest Berk, driving the residents into hiding.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.desc: Pounder - Ty and the crew must protect the Flatirons from Pounder, a predatory Poundersaurolophus who marks his territory by hammering everything in sight

programme.desc: Blue Moon Over Argentina - Odlulu takes the Guitar Key from Wizard Melodia in order to be the best guitar player in Buenos Aires. Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as special delivery deputies, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep36
programme.desc: Raa Raa The Copycat - Raa Raa is playing a game - copying everyone in the jungle. He soon distracts his friends but can he put the game to good use?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep36
programme.desc: The Case Of The Upset Animals - Something upsets all the animals at the farm at night and no one can get to sleep . Farmer Tom asks Noddy to investigate before night falls so that everyone can go to sleep properly. Using his wwwbook to gather clues and using all his investigation skills Noddy travels all over Toyland to find out what has been disturbing the animals. He works out that the new stickers that PatPat gave to the the animals are made out of glow in the dark paper. That's what's been upsetting them all! They couldn't get to sleep because it was too bright! Farmer Tom, Big Ears and Noddy remove all the stickers and everyone settles down for a good night's sleep. Well done Noddy! Shhh!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep88
programme.desc: Wasps - Stingo is very depressed. All the tots have noticed it. They decide to organise a very special "wasp" surprise for Stingo.

When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isnt good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends heads.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep1

Kelp tells his family hes a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep2
programme.desc: Tacos / Rainy Day - When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelps unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep13
programme.desc: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure - Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14

programme.desc: Rodney J. Dinkle, Babysitter / Lights Out - When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When theres a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep11
programme.desc: Crash Course - Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep7
programme.desc: Yeti Superstitious - Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his big bad year on the zodiac calendar which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNais superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he breaks up with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep15
programme.desc: Tale of Two Dragons - The gang must help the town ready for harvest but Hookfang and Stormfly are at each others throats.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep16
programme.desc: The Eel Effect - A dangerous flu is spreading throughout Berk and Toothless is its latest victim.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk Ep17
programme.desc: Smoke Gets In Your Eyes - A rogue species of dragon terrorizes Berk by stealing all of the metal in town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;hes forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep36
programme.desc: Halloween - Boss Baby uses the cover of Halloween Night to sneak into Bubeezees Headquarters to shut it all down. Tim covers for Boss by distracting Marisol with a night of trick or treating.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep20
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies - As a prank, George and Harold use Melvin's new animal hybrid invention to create a creature that's a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.desc: Sheep Dog - Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Housework - Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Pass the Parcel - Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep49
programme.desc: The Sailing Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are enjoying a day at the beach, when they meet the Penguins.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep48
programme.desc: The Tour Guide Badge - Gerbie the snake is on holiday and would like to see all the sights. Duggee can help!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep47
programme.desc: The Party Badge - Chipmunk has a parcel for Duggee, wrapped up like a present. Maybe it's Duggee's birthday!

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia - Glitch transform's Sydney's iconic Opera House into an opera boat for a race around the Australian city's harbour.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Fig - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the nicest, kindest, Fig, performing his song, "Just Can't Help Being Sweet!"

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Apple - Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Apple singing in celebration of her great-great-grandad, Apple Tree's, 100th birthday.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep46
programme.desc: Carrot Powers Up - Carrot wants to become super strong, so she restores Evil Pea's robot suit for herself.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep47
programme.desc: Evil Pea's Veggie Vision - Evil Pea is tricked by lots of Supertatoes who appear all over the supermarket.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep81
programme.desc: Give It Back - Tinky Winky and Dipsy both want a go with Tinky Winky's bag and start to squabble. The Noo-noo sucks up the bag and only gives it back when Tinky Winky and Dipsy are ready to share.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S7 Ep13
programme.desc: M - Dee encourages a friend to say 'm', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We jump in some mud, drink some milk and meet some musical meerkats!

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Frightful Friend - Plom is having a spooky sleepover for his friends at his house. But when Zip gets scared and decides to stay home, Plom tries to show him that scary things can sometimes be fun things too.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Messy-morphosis - Messy monster can't find his caterpillar friends. The garden bush where he left his friends is now covered with pretty butterflies. But where did the caterpillars go? He flutters off to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Niagara Falls, Canada and USA - Glitch blocks Niagara Falls to give GrimHQ a mud bath, so the Go Jetters set out to fix the problem.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia - Glitch transform's Sydney's iconic Opera House into an opera boat for a race around the Australian city's harbour.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Squash - When dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings don't always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Leptictidium & Fig - Andy is on the search for a leptictidium, a furry mammal from 50 million years ago.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mission: Bandage Team - Sylvie the therapy dog helps a little boy called Ben feel brave enough to see the doctor.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Lion and Sloth - Aneeshwar and Lizzie head out to meet lions. From their safari truck, they get right in amongst the pride and see big maned males as well as a large group of females. Their next animal is Rico, a two-toed sloth.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Aarrrt Show - In this episode Captain Captain takes up painting and is convinced she is a talented artist. She decides to put on an arrrt show of her work in the cove.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep33
programme.desc: The Island Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels are out doing a bit of sailing. What fun!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep32
programme.desc: The Voice Badge - Duggee explains why animals all have different voices.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep31
programme.desc: The Stick Badge - Duggee and the squirrels prepare for a campfire by collecting sticks of all sizes.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S24 Ep22
programme.desc: World of Tomorrow - When a pair of crooks steal plans for a great new invention, there is a high-speed chase to try and get them back and allow them to prove their worth.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Painting - Stanley goes to help Myrtle, who has found a paint smudge on the Town Hall's door!

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Circus - The circus bus has broken down, but the children are waiting for a circus show! Can Stanley help out?

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep48

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Power of Secret Service - Intelligence agencies are influencing governments and spying on countries with no regard for the law. And they are able to remain nearly invisible, in the process. Are they the new superpowers? The last time intelligence agencies commanded as much power as they do today was during the Cold War. Technological innovations mean that more sophisticated warfare is now a reality. It is not just about Russia and the USA anymore. We may be entering a new era of unrest. The U.S. has lost more spies and informants since 2010 than at any other time since the Cold War. Leaders of German intelligence agencies also acknowledge that they have once again fallen upon tough times. Money, data and access are proving to be major factors in determining who actually wields power. The 2016 U.S. election made this clear: U.S. intelligence agencies are certain that Russian intelligence helped elect Donald Trump. But the U.S. has lost old spheres of influence and allies are increasingly pursuing their own agendas. Can President Biden make his country a force for order in the world, again? And what does that mean for political hot spots and potential conflicts with China, Iran, and Russia? And for allies like Saudi Arabia and Turkey? Will Western intelligence agencies regain the power they once exerted? Wars fought with drone and hacker attacks, increasingly delegated power, and surveillance could push these conflicts to their tipping point.

programme.title: UFC 315: Muhammad vs. Della Maddalena
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Montreal, Quebec, Canada for the first time since 2015, and on May 11, fans at the Bell Centre will be treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event of UFC 315, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena. Perfect in seven trips to the Octagon, including five post-fight bonus-winning efforts, Della Maddalena is determined to bring a title down under, but in Muhammad, he will be facing a fighter who is undefeated for over six years while beating the best of the best at 170 pounds. In the co-main event, Valentina Shevchenko begins her second reign atop the flyweight division when she tackles top French contender Manon Fiorot

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC262

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Figueiredo
programme.desc: Prelims - On May 4, the UFC Octagon sets down in Des Moines, Iowa for the first time for a UFC Fight Night card at Wells Fargo Arena featuring two elite bantamweights fighting for a place in the title conversation. A former flyweight champion looking for his fourth win since moving to 135 pounds, Deiveson Figueiredo is chasing a historic second divisional title, but to move closer to that goal, hell have to get by Cory Sandhagen, a fellow top five contender who owns wins over Frankie Edgar, Marlon Vera and Rob Font.
